name: KAIJU BASH
description:
Ever wanted to be a giant monster and fight others for dominance? Then welcome to Kaiju Bash!

In this local multiplayer game, up to six players can become a Kaiju and wreak havoc on each other. Choose from a variety of colors and select one of three abilities, then it's battle time!

Will you be the last Kaiju standing?

(NOTE: Game has online multiplayer functionality if using PARSEC software)
